traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The goblin can Disengage or Hide as a bonus action.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing.

traits.name: Tactical Cunning
traits.text: Can evade opportunity attacks and aid allies.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Regains 10 HP at the start of its turn unless it takes acid or fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

traits.name: Undead Nature
traits.text: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces it to 0 HP, must succeed on a Con save or remain at 1 HP.

actions.name: Light Crossbow

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4+2) piercing. If target is a creature, it must succeed on DC 11 Strength save or be knocked prone.
